meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference (Webex)

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of minutes from the meetings held on September 11, 2024, and October 9, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Comprehensive Environmental & Climate Action Plan (CECAP) Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the annual report on the Comprehensive Environmental & Climate Action Plan.
agenda_items.presenter: Carlos Evans, Director; Oppong Hemeng, Senior Climate Coordinator; Rosaerlinda Cisneros, Climate Coordinator

agenda_items.title: Off-Street Parking and Loading Code Amendment
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the proposed amendments to the Off-Street Parking and Loading Code.
agenda_items.presenter: Michael Wade, Chief Planner (I), Planning and Development Department

agenda_items.title: Approval of 2025 Meeting Calendar
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the meeting calendar for the year 2025.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Subcommittee Updates
agenda_items.description: Updates from various subcommittees including Environmental Health, Environmental Justice, Implementation, Outreach & Engagement, and Strategic Partnerships & Innovation.

agenda_items.title: Monthly District Updates from Commissioners
agenda_items.description: Updates from commissioners regarding their respective districts.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Meetings
agenda_items.description: Information on upcoming meetings including the Parks, Trails, & the Environment Council Committee and the next Environmental Commission meeting.
